item.title: Bangalore to Chitradurga Solo Trip Plan: Complete Itinerary
item.description: A solo trip from Bangalore to Chitradurga is one of the most accessible and rewarding short journeys you can plan in Karnataka. Known for its historic fort, rocky landscape, windmill fields and calm environment, Chitradurga serves as an excellent weekend destination for travellers who want a mix of history, nature and peaceful exploration.
